description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Collapsible component.
label: Collapsible Layout

contains.description: Specifies the component contained within this Collapsible Body.
contains.label: Contains

headerItems.description: Specifies the component contained within this Collapsible Header.
headerItems.label: Header Items

isCollapsed.description: Specifies whether the Collapsible content is collapsed or not.
isCollapsed.label: Is Collapsed

showCollapse.description: Specifies whether the Collapsible should render the collapse feature.
showCollapse.label: Show Collapse
